reviewText:
Poor production value with little by way of information presented. A guy with a camcorder walking around pointing his camera at nothing. And nothing. And more nothing.

It's one saving grace is an interview with a former patient. More like that. Or a narrative of any kind. Would have elevated this to watchable, informative, and exciting.

A very informative historical documentary about the abandoned Kings Park Psychiatric Center on Long Island complete with an actual tour of the abandoned facility and interviews. Great job, John and company. I am glad I bought it.
